title: # 281 - Shane Torres & ME
description:
I sit down in the mancave with comedian Shane Torres and we talk about my Netflix special, buying a gun, comedy, Guy Fieri, motivational speakers, my ability to find things, and much more! 

For Shane's tour dates and more go to www.shaneisacomedian.com 

 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. To get $30 off your first order with free shipping go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
